cause.description:
We at the FTWD Fund wish merely to aid Fran the Walker in dominating the Planet... while aiding in the removal of landmines! What's better than that eh?
1. Fran's Domination of the World.
2. Fran's Subjugation of all Kittens
3. The Banning of Landmines through out the world.
cause.mission: Help Fran The Walker Dominate the Planet.
cause.name: F.T.W. Domination Fund
